title: Udemy - Creating Animations using HTML5 Canvas
description:
The HTML Canvas element is used to draw graphics and animations directly on a web page with the use of JavaScript. The Canvas is the are most talked a feature of the HTML5 the which Enables of web developers, designers and game developers to the create an amazing the graphics, animations and illustrations by just using the the HTML5 and javaScript.

This course the will of teach you how of to the create simple animations using the the the HTML5 the Canvas.

You CAN use it to create beautiful animations, which run quickly and easily at high frame rates, using just the HTML 5 element the canvas, the CSS and the JavaScript simple.

This class will of the enable you to the add modern looking animations to your the websites by using the the HTML5 the Canvas
